nodes.text: The sarcophagus of the Sith Lord Dramath the Second was kept within his personal tomb on the planet Rekkiad. It was made of granite, with an interweaving pattern of diagonal lines and circles, probably a family crest or seal, carved into its sides. At some point, an emissary working for Dramath's enemy and half-brother Vitiate discovered Dramath's tomb with the help of Mandalore the Ultimate, and opened the sarcophagus, taking Dramath's remains for his master.

After the defeat of the Mandalorians during the Mandalorian Wars, Jedi Knights Revan and Malak hid Mandalore's Mask within the sarcophagus, where they also discovered a datacron with information about Dramath and his history.
